title: Kazem el Saher releases his first signature fragrance
text:
Kazem el Saher releases his first signature fragrance Kazem el Saher releases his first signature fragrance 2.5 5 
Published October 14th, 2015 - 14:28 GMT via SyndiGate.info Rate Article: Kazem is releasing his first perfume in the Middle East. (File photo) Follow > Click here to add Elissa as an alert Click here to remove the Elissa alert Disable alert for Elissa Click here to add Haifa Wehbe as an alert Click here to remove the Haifa Wehbe alert Disable alert for Haifa Wehbe , Click here to add Myriam Fares as an alert Click here to remove the Myriam Fares alert Disable alert for Myriam Fares 
Do you wanna smell like Kazem el Saher? 
Let us explain! 
Just like Lebanese stars Elissa, Haifa Wehbe and Myriam Fares, the Iraqi superstar is releasing his very own signature fragrance in collaboration with Abdul Samad al Qurashi for perfumes in Lebanon. 
It hasn't yet been revealed whether the perfume is made for men or women, but we're sure it will leave you feeling either "tall, dark and handsome," or "sexy and feminine." 
Kazem is currently a judge on The Voice Arabia Season 3, which currently airs on Saturdays on MBC TV . Advertisement Â© 2000 - 2015 Al Bawaba (www.albawaba.com) Rate Article:
